name: remote-mcp
description: Integrate Remote.com's HR and payroll systems with Claude.
long_description: The Remote MCP Server enables Claude to interact with Remote.com's API for HR operations including employee management, time-off requests, expense tracking, payroll operations, and company management. Perfect for HR automation and employee self-service workflows.

api_base_url.title: API Base URL
api_base_url.description: Your API base URL (optional, auto-detected based on the API key if not provided)

allowed_tools.title: Allowed Tools
allowed_tools.description: Comma-separated list of allowed tools (optional, allows all if not specified)

tools.name: list_time_off
tools.description: Lists time off records with filtering and pagination. Can be used to find pending requests that need approval.

tools.name: create_time_off
tools.description: Creates a PRE-APPROVED time off record. Requires employment ID, dates, and time off type.

tools.name: get_time_off
tools.description: Retrieves details of a specific time off record by ID.

tools.name: update_time_off
tools.description: Updates an existing time off record with new information.

tools.name: approve_time_off
tools.description: Approves a pending time off request.

tools.name: decline_time_off
tools.description: Declines a pending time off request with optional reason.

tools.name: cancel_time_off
tools.description: Cancels an approved time off request.

tools.name: approve_cancel_request
tools.description: Approves a cancellation request for time off.

tools.name: decline_cancel_request
tools.description: Declines a cancellation request for time off.

tools.name: list_time_off_types
tools.description: Lists all available time off types (sick leave, vacation, etc.).

tools.name: leave_balance
tools.description: Gets the leave balance for an employee showing available days.

tools.name: leave_policies_details
tools.description: Retrieves leave policy details and rules.

tools.name: list_employments
tools.description: Lists employment records with filtering options.

tools.name: show_employment
tools.description: Shows detailed information about a specific employment.

tools.name: list_company_managers
tools.description: Lists all company managers who can approve requests.

tools.name: list_expenses
tools.description: Lists expense records that may need approval or review.

tools.name: create_expense
tools.description: Creates a new expense record for reimbursement.

tools.name: get_expense
tools.description: Retrieves details of a specific expense record.

tools.name: update_expense
tools.description: Updates an existing expense record.

tools.name: list_timesheets
tools.description: Lists timesheet records with filtering and pagination.

tools.name: get_timesheet
tools.description: Retrieves details of a specific timesheet.

tools.name: approve_timesheet
tools.description: Approves a submitted timesheet.

tools.name: send_back_timesheet
tools.description: Sends a timesheet back for revision.

tools.name: list_payroll_runs
tools.description: Lists payroll runs with filtering options.

tools.name: show_payroll_run
tools.description: Shows detailed information about a specific payroll run.

tools.name: list_payslips
tools.description: Lists payslips for employees.

tools.name: list_billing_documents
tools.description: Lists billing documents and invoices.

tools.name: show_billing_document
tools.description: Shows details of a specific billing document.

tools.name: get_billing_document_breakdown
tools.description: Gets detailed breakdown of billing document charges.
